_header: O blessed Mary the flower of virginity
_description: A salutation to the Virgin Mary — six stanzas rhyme royal

Lam306.First Lines:
O blessed maryde the flowre of virgynitieO
                    quene of hevyn imperyall…
Lam306.Last Lines:
…And till his hole realmeAs thou bare Iubiter in
                    bethleemExplicit
Lam306.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
EETS
         o.s. 15 (1866); repr. 1962; rev. ed. 1903: 81-2; rev. ed. 112-13.
